properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 1 at 2:23PM PST until January 3 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous
seas around 18 feet at 19 seconds. For the Small Craft Advisory,
south winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and seas 13 to 18
feet at 19 seconds expected. For the Gale Watch, south winds 30
to 40 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and building seas 13 to 18 feet
at 14 seconds possible.

* WHERE...For hazardous seas, from Bandon north until 4 PM. For
small craft, from Cape Blanco to Bandon becoming all areas until
Friday morning. Gale watch, beyond 2 NM from shore.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, until 4 PM PST this
afternoon. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 PM PST
Friday. For the Gale Watch, from Friday morning through Friday
evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid strong winds and
very steep seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course,
and/or secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST FRIDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
